name: holo-caster
effect: Displays cutscene conversations as the plot advances.
short_effect: Displays cutscene conversations as the plot advances.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A device that allows users to receive
and view hologram clips at any time.
It is also used to chat with others.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A device that allows users to receive and view
hologram clips at any time. It’s also used to chat
with others.
